lead_paragraph: EVANSTON, Ill. July 7 (AP) — Pat Fitzgerald was in the middle of a stunning transformation at Northwestern during the mid-1990s. An All-American linebacker, he helped a longtime losing program win two Big Ten Conference titles and earn trips to the Rose and the Citrus Bowls.
